=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' <nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/r/rrdtool]]</nowiki>; available for all supported architectures.
# ''Rationale:''
** Runtime dependency for munin.
 0. ''Security:''
** No <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=rrdtool|CVE]]</nowiki> entries,
** No <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=rrdtool|Secunia]]</nowiki> history.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** No daemons
** No network activity.
** No source code review.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** The package should work out of the box.
** The package does not ask any debconf questions.
** <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:rrdtool|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.debian.org/r/rrdtool.html|Maintenance in Debian]]</nowiki> is calm.
** <nowiki>[[http://oss.oetiker.ch/rrdtool/|Upstream]]</nowiki> is vigorous.
** <nowiki>[[http://oss.oetiker.ch/rrdtool-trac/query|Upstream bug tracker]]</nowiki>
** No special hardware is required.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki> compliant.
** <nowiki>[[http://www.netfort.gr.jp/~dancer/column/libpkg-guide/libpkg-guide.html|Debian library packaging guide]]</nowiki> standards compliant.
** Uses debhelper with no patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** debhelper (>= 5.0.37.1), cgilib (>= 0.5-4.1), zlib1g-dev, libpng12-dev, libart-2.0-dev, libfreetype6-dev, groff, tcl8.4-dev, perl (>= 5.8.0), python-all-dev (>= 2.3.5-10)
** All are in main.
